uhh_lt.newsleak.annotator

Class KeytermExtractor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.uima.analysis_component.AnalysisComponent_ImplBase
      • org.apache.uima.analysis_component.Annotator_ImplBase
        • org.apache.uima.analysis_component.JCasAnnotator_ImplBase
          • org.apache.uima.fit.component.JCasAnnotator_ImplBase
            • uhh_lt.newsleak.annotator.KeytermExtractor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.uima.analysis_component.AnalysisComponent

    public class KeytermExtractor
extends org.apache.uima.fit.component.JCasAnnotator_ImplBase
    UIMA annotator for key term extraction. Uses the uhh-lt/lt-keyterms maven package providing statistical keyness measurement based on log likelihood comparison with a reference corpus.

      • getKeyWords

        public java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getKeyWords(org.apache.uima.jcas.JCas jcas)
        Gets the key words from a document using the lt-keyterms library. Keyterms are only extracted from paragraphs which are supposed to contain full texts, i.e. are not marked as dubious "not fulltext" (such as log files).
        Parameters:
        jcas - the jcas
        Returns:
        the key words
